DOC.brief_summary: Basic Protocol 1 . Identify participant ( ) 2 . Request patient participation/Acquire Consent 3 . Register patient www.stabilityplus.net LOGIN tab - Patient ID ( Name/Initials/SSN combination thereof ) - Gender - Age - Surgical Procedure - Date Surgery - Select Basic Exercise Program correspond Surgical Procedure 4 . Perform Initial Assessment use Basic Exercises Surgical Procedure 5 . Enter Assessment Data www.stabilityplus.net ( LOGIN tab/Portal ) 6 . Within portal , modify Basic Exercise Program create customize Stability Plus prescription patient 7 . Monitor patient progress Stability Plus portal .
DOC.brief_title: Stability Plus - Outcomes From Extended Continuum Care
DOC.criteria: Undergone total joint replacement Must able complete preoperative strength assessment Must able exercise use specify resistive band Nonambulatory patient
